page.title: 15Farming round Charing
page.content:
There are three different types of farms in our 12 square kilometres. 1. Arable; only crops. 2. Pasture; all grassland. 3. Mixed; both arable and pasture.
Within our 12 square kilometres there are 14 farms,but for this project we only visited 12 farms because two of the farms had only a farmhouse and very little land. The twelve farms that we visited grow grass, barley, maize, wheat, oil-seed rape, potatoes, oats and kale. Animals that are kept are cows, sheep, and horses. One farm breeds trout, another bred greyhounds and one other had bullocks.
